name: GesmenArrives
_source: s;Bouncer;The host of this evening's festivities!{w}{br}SENATOR GESMEN!
s;Anuki;Fashionably late to his own party?
s;Anuki;We have the words, so let's hurry up and meet Lupus.
s;Simon;I believe I'd like to speak to him.
s;Anuki;Are you crazy? Have you been killed too many times and finally lost it?{w}{br}We're here to rob his mansion!
s;Simon;He doesn't know that.{w} It may be risky, but, as nobles,{w}{br}men like him are our natural enemies.{w}{br}Isn't it worthwhile to try and understand them?
s;Anuki;...No? What are you talking about?
s;Simon;You need not follow me. If I speak with him, I won't be long.
